name: XG Accordion
author: Xgenious

sections.description:
Display XG Accordion anywhere in your wordpress site using XG Accordion plugin shortcodes. it has build in support for popuplar page builder like Elementor and Wpbakery Page Builder.

CHECK XG Accordion[FREE] DEMOS
XG Accordion Demo

XG Accordion Pro Plugin[PAID] Demos
Pro Version Demo (it give a pro version of plugin file.)

AWESOME FEATURES

  • Add XG Accordion using shortcode as your requirements
  • 05 unique design
  • Drag & Drop Ordering
  • Unlimited color options
  • Typography options
  • Easy to customize with plugin Options
  • fully responsive
  • Cross browser support

XG Accordion Pro [PAID] Features

  • 22 Unique tabs Styles * More Style Coming Soon!
  • Category wise product slider
  • Drag & Drop Ordering
  • Limit To Display number of accordion
  • Responsive Design
  • Fully Customizeable
  • Typography Options
  • Unlimited Color Scheme
  • Build in support for Elementor
  • Build in suppor for Wpbakery Page Builder
  • 100% Multi Language
  • Smooth hover effect
  • All Browser Supported
  • All Browser Supported
  • Compatible latest version WordPress
  • Cross browser support
  • Clean Coding, W3c Validate
  • 24/7 First Support
  • Step by Step Well Documented
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/xg-accordion directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to XG Accordion option and here you see options change the setting as per your need. or leave this and just copy thes shortcode given here it will take default settings.

  4. To embed the XG Accordion in a page or post, use the default shortcode: [xga__accordion]

  5. ONLINE DOCUMENTATION :- Click Here
sections.faq:
How do I get the XG Accordion widget to show up?

Use the shortcode: [xga__accordion ] and the XG accordion widget will appear in your post or page.

How do I modify XG Accordion plugin shortcode ?

In admin menu you see XG Accordion menu. go here and modify using plugin option.

Something Else?

If you are having any other issues, please post in the Support Forum and I will respond as soon as possible.
